addInformation: Add information and decide when to publish.
whatDoYouWantYourAudienceToKnow: What else do you want your audience to know?
createAudioAndVideoInSimpleSteps: Create an audio or video episode in a few simple steps.
guidanceAndBestPractices: For more guidance and best practices, check out our audio and video guidelines.
setupTips: Choose a name and cover art for your podcast. Don't have it all figured out yet? You can always change this later.
makeYourFirstEpisodeTip: Tip: if you're not totally ready to commit, try making a short trailer to get your podcast out there.
getListenersTips: All that's left to do is tell people about your podcast. As soon as you get a few plays, we'll show your analytics here.
